com.github.gwtbootstrap.client.ui.base

Class HoverBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.gwtbootstrap.client.ui.base.MarkupWidget
      • com.github.gwtbootstrap.client.ui.base.HoverBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasId, HasPlacement, HasShowDelay, HasTrigger, HasVisibility, IsAnimated, AcceptsOneWidget, HasOneWidget, HasText, HasWidgets, IsWidget, Iterable<Widget>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Popover, Tooltip

    public abstract class HoverBase
extends MarkupWidget
implements IsWidget, HasWidgets, HasOneWidget, IsAnimated, HasTrigger, HasPlacement, HasText, HasShowDelay, HasVisibility
    Base class for widgets that hover above other widgets.
    Since:
    2.0.4.0
    Author:
    Dominik Mayer
    See Also:
    Bootstrap documentation

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasWidgets

      • reconfigure

        public abstract void reconfigure()
        Redraws the widget with the currently set options. This must not be called when a parameter is updated because it would deactivate all other parameters. No idea why...

        public void toggle()
        Toggles the view state of the widget.

        It will be hidden if it was previously shown and shown if it was previously hidden.

        Specified by:
        toggle in interface HasVisibility
